title: How do I obtain bootloader unlock permissions
answer:
Please visit [](http://emui.huawei.com/plugin.php?id=unlock&mod=unlock&action=apply%22 \o %22 )[Request unlo]()[c]()k code to request an official unlock code. Follow the instructions on the page to unlock your bootloader. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123119)

 Please read the unlocking disclaimer displayed on the website carefully.
keywords: obtain root permissions, unlock permissions, unlock
